website_summaries.verdict: Though its plastic skin doesn't do its high price justice, Samsung's Galaxy Note 3 makes the most compelling case yet for a supersize phone.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy Note 3 has a gorgeous and massive screen, screaming quad-core processor, and refined S Pen skills
It also has long battery life, makes clear calls, and takes great pictures
cons: The Note 3 is expensive, large, and its faux-leather styling is crafted from cheap plastic

customer_reviews.title: The phone was almost exactly as described, except for ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone was almost exactly as described, except for one very important detail: it was definitely not unlocked. It was registered through AT&T and it has been a real pain in the ass to get the dang thing unlocked without paying additional fees. If I had known I would have to unlock it, I doubt I would have purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Miller

customer_reviews.title: so far kind of so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Got it, as soon as I placed my sim and memory card it started working. Very pleased with the quality its neat and easy to use. I hope my review continues to be good considering my bad luck with amazon. The s pen doesn't always work but that's minor. Still so kind of so good but the s pen is worthless. Real P.O.S. I love the s pen function so I'm now having to look for a replacement so I'm dropping my 4 stars to 3. I shouldn't have to order another s pen.
customer_reviews.author: lydia joseph phillip

customer_reviews.title: Great phone so far!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone so far gotta let it sink in and what not. I bought this phone because I cracked my other one very badly for the first time and warranty or not I'd be around the same price. This phone all though it may look like it has tiny bite marks of some sort at the upper left corner metal ring is a good working unlocked phone. My service is T-mobile so I'll just have to get used to the AT&T start up. Another thing is I rarely leave rattings for things I buy and bought this phone in the used section category so it was cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: ♡kouwanai♡

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: I had this type of phone before. So when it was delivered it was as expected; but better. I expected because I bought it used that there was dents and scratches. There was one superficial scratch on the battery cover. Thats it! Otherwise in great condition. I use the phone for work so I upgraded the battery. The main reason that I chose this model. I am extremely satisfied. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Levarn Cavers Jr

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY.. YOU WILL REGRET IT
customer_reviews.text: I've read both reviews and decided to sided with the positive size. HUGE MISTAKE. Be aware. Don't purchase this phone from this seller. They are all defective. The phone freezes and glitches. It turns off and on by itself. I lost my money because I brought to my girl who lives outside the country. Stay away from buying phones online.
customer_reviews.author: mackenson mirtil

customer_reviews.title: excellent iphone 6+ alternative
customer_reviews.text: While it's unlocked, ours came loaded with AT&T bloatware which you can't get rid of without rooting it. Eventually I might do that but only after being sure I won't kill it. It's a very sharp phone though and for the price, in comparison to an iPhone 6+, it's worth any hassle you have with it.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Blair

customer_reviews.title: A headache to get working properly
customer_reviews.text: The phone works fine but it was NOT unlocked when I received it. I had to pay $25 for an unlock code after repeated attempts to reach the seller (J&R Electronics) that were ignored. I cannot believe the level of unproffesionalism surrounding my experience with this product. Once I paid the $25, the phone works fine. There were little nicks and scratches, but none on the screen, so that's all covered by a case anyway. Two stars for a decent phone and horrible CS.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Post

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: This has become my wife's favorite phone of all time. She told me she wanted a smaller phone but I got her this as a gift anyway knowing she uses Skype all the time (also hoping she would make me get her another one and I could take this one but she kept it loves it). I got her the watch as well so she wouldn't have issues with the size but she rarely uses the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Bertikus

customer_reviews.title: the phone speed is great and the apps seem to function very well
customer_reviews.text: The phone operates very lovely, my main issue with the phone is the battery power. I expected it to last longer. the phone speed is great and the apps seem to function very well. Even though I use headphone when I'm listening to music, anyone would expect a phone that size to be louder. The phone is compatible with all the apps I've been interested in on Google play store so far. I was not disappointed by the camera quality, and the features as it relates to the setting, (Sports, beauty face, etc) operates wonderfully. I have not examined every aspect the phone yet but so far I am comfortable with it and it has been very reliable. :)
customer_reviews.author: shaquille chin

customer_reviews.title: i love it the best decision i ever made instead of ...
customer_reviews.text: i love it the best decision i ever made instead of buying a s5 i bought this for the size charging time is fatser in this is also uses the usb3.0 charger which is cstill compatible with the usb2.0 and seems to charge faster than usb2.0..oh yeah phones is unlocked so i was able to use my tmobile sim
customer_reviews.author: westley see

customer_reviews.title: Good quality phone
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels just like new phone. Large storage and fast processing, battery holding charge especially well. Better than expected
customer_reviews.author: J Yee

customer_reviews.title: could be better
customer_reviews.text: Well first off I was sent the wrong phone which put me in a tight.. Once I finally received the correct phone it seemed to work like a dream . It had pretty much all the memory to be refurbished which was great. Then I noticed that the battery was no good.. it could barely last over an hour with average use so now I'm going to have to buy a battery. Then (of course I haven't dropped it) the screen is not in its frame.. it's popping up and so I'm going to have to pay for someone to put it in correctly .. this is very hectic and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Locker

customer_reviews.title: If you are thinking about buying go ahead and do something nice for yourself.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I have ever bought for myself. I love it and I can see the screen. (so can anyone else near you) I don't know why I waited so long. I just used the SIM card from my Galaxy and updated the carrier to Straight Talk. I get 4G in rural Southwest Virginia. Great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Note 3 and Amazon.com Rock!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Samsung Note 3! I bought it unlocked so I have the freedom to choose a network. If one network starts to get a pain on the side to say it lightly, I can drop them in one second with no hesitation at all! All my orders arrived on the same day ---the phone and case. They had the best price too! Amazon.com is my new favorite go-to online store now.
customer_reviews.author: EMILY URSPRUNG

customer_reviews.title: "Tethering and portable hot spot" capability disable.
customer_reviews.text: This phone come with the "Tethering and portable hot spot" capability disable and can not be turned on. This funtion has been blocked by ATT so that you can not be able to share your data connection. This information is not on the product description. I really hate this kind of trick. I need from Amazon or the seller the information needed to unlock this capability on this phone. I will appreciate any help.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan A. Jassir

customer_reviews.title: midwest trading has fake note 3's
customer_reviews.text: The item I got is a fake. I took it to best buy and the samsung inspector said it was a fake. The s pen is plastic and wont work and doesn't fit the note 3 display model at best buy. I got scamed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Morris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is incredible as it suits my lifestyle ver well. Great battery life, super not taking ability, etc. Upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: Tebro

customer_reviews.title: No satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't use Internet outside, specifically asked for Tmobile. I thought I had thirty days to return according to Amazon. Unhappy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This device is more than perfect. The seller sent it to me on time.
customer_reviews.author: Elie Abboud

customer_reviews.title: battery drains very fast
customer_reviews.text: I am comparing with note 2 with original 3100mah.Note 3 has better screen and bigger battery (3200mah). more processor, more ram... that drains a lot. note 3's battery life can be little shorter, but not that much. My phone is allways in power saver mode. I always turn off the gps if i do not use it. i always use my screen at very low light. Do not run so many apps at same time. I love the design. s pen is very good. but my main purpose was the battery life. I may buy note 2 one more time or wait for note 4.
customer_reviews.author: diyarbakirli muhendis

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Note 3 N900 32GB Unlocked GSM 4G LTE Android Smartphone w/S Pen Stylus - Black
product_meta.description: Color:BLACK2G Network : GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900, 3G Network : HSDPA 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100 , SIM: Micro-SIM, Dimensions: 151.2 x 79.2 x 8.3 mm (5.95 x 3.12 x 0.33 in), Weight: 168 g (5.93 oz), Display Type: Super AMOLED capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors Size: 1080 x 1920 pixels, 5.7 inches (~386 ppi pixel density), Sound: Vibration; MP3, WAV ringtones, Card slot: microSD, up to 64 GB, Internal: 32 GB storage, 3 GB RAM, Speed: HSDPA, 42 Mbps; HSUPA; LTE, Cat4, 50 Mbps UL, 150 Mbps DL, WLAN : Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, DLNA, Wi-Fi Direct, Wi-Fi hotspot, Camera : Primary 13 MP, 4128 x 3096 pixels, autofocus, LED flash; Secondary Yes, 2 MP, 1080p@30fps, OS : Android OS, v4.3 (Jelly Bean) Chipset: Exynos 5 Octa 5420 (N9000), CPU: / Quad-core 1.9 GHz Cortex-A15 & quad-core 1.3 GHz Cortex-A7 (N9000)
feature_bullets: Chipset: Exynos 5 Octa 542, Mali-T628 MP6 Graphics
13 Megapixel Camera (4128 x 3096 pixels) w/ Autofocus & LED Flash + Front-Facing 2 Megapixel Camera

5.7-inch Super AMOLED Capacitive Multi-Touchscreen w/ Protective Corning Gorilla Glass 3 Android v4.3 (Jelly Bean), upgradable to v4.4.2 (KitKat), Quad-Core 1.9 GHz Cortex-A15 & Quad-Core 1.3 GHz Cortex-A7 Processor
Internal Memory: 32GB storage, 3GB RAM + microSD Slot Expandable up to 64GB
Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T and T-Mobile as well as with GSM SIM cards (e.g. H20, Straight Talk, and select prepaid carriers).
Unlocked cell phones will not work with CDMA Carriers like Sprint, Verizon, Boost or Virgin.
